text: ICYMI : Actress, singer, and all - around wellness aficionado Lea Michele took over our Instagram account last week as part of her weekly Wellness Wednesday series. From her must - have nighttime skincare picks to her go - to healthy dinner to her ultimate self - care essentials — bathing rituals included — she shared it all. ( And we've already made it a personal mission to adopt each and every one of her recommendations. ) So just in case you did miss the takeover, we're recapping every minute so you can glean all of the game - changing products, tips, and rituals that keep Michele glowing from head to toe all year round. Keep reading for the breakdown.
